title: Unable to install curl@7.50.1%intel@16.0.3 via spack
body:
I'm looking for advice on how to debug this issue.  Spack fails to build curl@7.50.1 with intel@16.0.3 for me:

```
$ spack install --dirty curl
...
==> Building curl
==> Error: Command exited with status 2:
See build log for details:
  /tmp/$USER/spack-stage/spack-stage-FuILeT/curl-7.50.1/spack-build.out

$SPACK_ROOT/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/curl/package.py:52, in install:
     47       def install(self, spec, prefix):
     48           configure('--prefix=%s' % prefix,
     49                     '--with-zlib=%s' % spec['zlib'].prefix,
     50                     '--with-ssl=%s' % spec['openssl'].prefix)
     51   
  >> 52           make()
     53           make("install")
$ cat /tmp/$USER/spack-stage/spack-stage-FuILeT/curl-7.50.1/spack-build.out
...
  CCLD     curl
icc: error #10236: File not found:  '../lib/.libs/libcurl.so'
$ ls -l lib/.libs/libcurl.so*
lib/.libs/libcurl.so -> libcurl.so.4.4.0
# libcurl.so.4.4.0 is missing
```

However, I can configure and build curl w/o issue if I do so outside of spack:

```
$ head -n 1 /tmp/$USER/spack-stage/spack-stage-FuILeT/curl-7.50.1/spack-build.out # find the configure command and use it below
$ cd /scratch; tar -xvf $SPACK_MIRROR/curl/curl-7.50.1.tar.bz2
$ cd curl-7.50.1
$ ./configure '--prefix=$SPACK_ROOT/opt/spack/linux-redhat6-x86_64/intel-16.0.3/curl-7.50.1-rouubmwgpgtod6zsmlcnhdfwsflmdlek' '--with-zlib=$SPACK_ROOT/opt/spack/linux-redhat6-x86_64/intel-16.0.3/zlib-1.2.8-j27etskpawg5lrge6wovazubcsgk4jba' '--with-ssl=$SPACK_ROOT/opt/spack/linux-redhat6-x86_64/intel-16.0.3/openssl-1.0.2h-a5obyxw6ju5vq5qpb3vunuz6sgm2anob'
$ make -j 12
$  ls -l lib/.libs/libcurl.so*
lib/.libs/libcurl.so -> libcurl.so.4.4.0*
lib/.libs/libcurl.so.4 -> libcurl.so.4.4.0*
lib/.libs/libcurl.so.4.4.0*
```

How do I debug this spack failure?
